Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Hello All,


I archived a website with Heritrix, into ARC files, splitted after 1GB. So
the archived copy of the website is more than one ARC file. I set up a
Wayback Machine (version 1.6), and built up a CDX index as I read it here
<https://github.com/iipc/openwayback/wiki/How-to-configure>, it seems to
work fine, I can browse in the archived copy via Wayback.

But:
Wayback lists the ARC files separately, as they were different copies of
that website and so not all the links are working.

I need Wayback to handle the ARC files of one website copy as one. How can
I configure it to work like this?


Thanks in advance for any help,
Zsolt

--089e0158c31a69f66d05047fe5d7
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
